data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Maidment, Susannah C. R., Barrett, Paul M. (2011): A new specimen of Chasmosaurus belli (Ornithischia: Ceratopsidae), a revision of the genus, and the utility of postcrania in the taxonomy and systematics of ceratopsid dinosaurs. Zootaxa 2963: 1-47, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.278172
